gamerule.phantomSpawningThreshold.descri: How many server ticks need to pass since a player has slept in a bed, for phantoms to spawn for them
gamerule.phantomSpawningCooldownPercenta: A multiplier for the internal cooldown of phantom spawns. Lower values mean phantoms may spawn more often. There is no limit on how many phantoms may be present at once.
gamerule.phantomSpawningChancePercentage: A multiplier for the chance of phantom spawns. Lower values mean less chance.
adjusted-phantom-spawns.midnightconfig.m: This configuration does not contain options that modify the actual behavior of the mod. They can be modified per-world with game rules.
adjusted-phantom-spawns.midnightconfig.d: Print adjustments to the "Time Since Last Rest" statistic
